text: Pace University is a private university with its main campus in New York City and a second campus in Westchester County, New York. It was created in 1906 as a business school. Pace has about 13,000 students. It offers about 100 majors at its six schools. The university also offers a Master of Fine Arts in acting through The Actors Studio Drama School and is home to the Inside the Actors Studio television show. ==References== Category:1900s establishments in New York (state) Category:1906 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in New York City
title: Pace University
